description:
We are looking for a manager for our designer consignment store in Silverlake. Searching for a candidate who wants to grow with the company as we are expanding every year!

Qualifications:

  • Familiarity with high-end designer labels
  • Knowledge of the terminology of cuts / styles of garments
  • Comfortable using google drive and simple formulas
  • Ability to multitask


If you believe you fit the position, please send your resume along with:

Your 3 favorite stores in Los Angeles

3 favorite designers

Why you think you'd be a great fit with us

Gift of Garb

www.giftofgarb.com
